#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	int day,t,back,i,start,sumd,len,month,year,total;char str[50],c;
		cin.get(str,25,'\n'); len=strlen(str); //cout<<"LEN : "<<len<<endl;
		for(i=0;i<len;i++)
		{  c=str[i];
			if(isspace(c)) { start=i; break; } 
		
		  }
		//cout<<"START  :  "<<start<<endl;
		if(start==2) day=(str[0]-'0')*10+(str[1]-'0');
		  else day=str[0]-'0';
		start++;//to escape space
		//cout<<"CHARACTER  :  "<<str[start]<<endl;
		switch(str[start])
		{
		/*JAN, FEB, MAR, APR, MAY, JUN, JUL, AUG, SEP, OCT, NOV, DEC*/
			case 'J' : if(str[start+1]=='a') month=1;
				else if(str[start+2]=='n') month =6 ;
				else month=7;break;
			case 'F': month=2;break;
			case 'M':  if(str[start+2]=='r') month=3;
			                else month=5;         break;
			case 'A' : if(str[start+1]=='p') month=4; 
			                 else month=8; break;
			case 'S' : month=9;break;
			case 'O'  : month=10;break;
			case 'N' :  month=11; break;
			case 'D': month=12; break;
		}
		back=len;
		while(!isspace(str[back-1])) back--;
		year=(str[back]-'0')*1000+(str[back+1]-'0')*100+(str[back+2]-'0')*10+(str[back+3]-'0');
		/*cout<<"day : "<<day<<endl;
		cout<<"month : "<<month<<endl;
		cout<<"year : "<<year<<endl;  */
		total=day*month+year;   //cout<<"total : "<<total<<endl;
		while(total>9)
		{
			sumd=0;
			while(total)
			{
				sumd+=total%10; total/=10;
			}   // cout<<"total    :  "<<sumd<<endl;
			total=sumd;
		}
		cout<<total<<endl;
	return 0;
}
